text:
Good night, guys!

I have a problem with an specific landing page.

Can I record a short video sharing my screen and send here?

Because I think it would be better that way!

Thanks,

Pedro, 360 Suítes

Does anyone have any idea how (full-color?) icons have been added to the repeater labels in the screenshot attached to this question?
Is this just using an image field as the sorting label field, and inappropriately repeating the section title in the image’s alt text? Or is there some sort of hack/undocumented feature in play here?

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CMXUWUY5D/p1695763871170789>
